item.title: Ford throws out Henry Ford’s assembly line to make low-cost EVs in America
item.description: The automaker is investing $2 billion into the Louisville Assembly Plant with a $30,000 EV pickup slated for 2027.

item.title: Apple’s new Siri may allow users to operate apps just using voice

item.title: Nigerian profitable food delivery Chowdeck lands $9M from Novastar, Y Combinator
